Languages: Celestial, Aquan, understands Common but cannot speak

Traits.Name: Aura of Luck
Traits.Content: All allies within 30 feet of Piscis have advantage on saving throws against being frightened or charmed.

Traits.Name: Peaceful Reflection
Traits.Content: When Piscis takes damage, it can reduce that damage by 5, as long as it can see the attacker.

Traits.Name: Spellcasting
Traits.Content: Piscis can cast spells using Charisma as its spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells: At will: guidance, prestidigitation. 3/day each: charm person, bless, healing word.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: Piscis makes three attacks: one with Radiant Ripple, one with Gleaming Strike, and one with Soothing Wave. When its Aura of Luck ability is available, it can use that ability in place of Radiant Ripple.

Actions.Name: Radiant Ripple
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) radiant damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Gleaming Strike
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) radiant damage, and the target takes an additional 5 psychic damage as dazzling lights strike their mind.

Actions.Name: Soothing Wave
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) healing energy damage, and if the target is a creature, it regains hit points equal to half the damage dealt.

Actions.Name: Special Ability (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: Piscis creates a wave of shimmering light in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 (7d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
